name: Losing Control (kylempurser)
description:
Defend your home from a continuous onslaught while struggling to keep control of your abilities!

Pick a load out of abilities that all use control to activate. As you defeat enemies you will gain back control. Reach full control and unleash and ultimate move combining all of your abilities together and wreaking havoc...but look out as your control will be depleted and you will be forced to box your enemies to death until you have gained control back!

Abilities

All control abilities have their standard use but when unleashing your ultimate will combine and do a more powerful version to truly devastate your foes! Pick the combination that suits your play style!

Quick: Give yourself a speed boost for a period of time!
Jump: Launch yourself super high into the air!
Blink: Teleport yourself forward!
Fire Ball: Launch a powerful fireball that causes AOE damage!
Magic Missile: Fire a homing missile into the air that will track your target!
Lightning: Rain down lightning from the sky!
Heal: Heal overtime for a period of time!
Shield: Gain a shield to protect you that will deplete overtime!
Knockback: Push all your surrounding enemies back!

Primary: Your primary ability does not use control BUT you will have to get in close to punch the enemy which could be dangerous!

Controls
Can be player with either Mouse & Keyboard or an Xbox controller (Menus require Mouse & Keyboard)

Control Abilities: 1-3 Keys (X, Y, B)
Primary Ability: Left-Mouse (Right Trigger)
Ultimate: Right-Mouse (Left-Trigger)
Move: WASD (Left-Joystick)
Jump: Space (A)
Camera: Mouse (Right-Joystick)

Created within 48hrs for GMTK2020 by Kyle Purser & Jake Singer
